Articles.Content:
Hey Guys, im new here ;D

And yeah, im from Austria so please forgive me for my English.

To me:

Im 16 years old, live in Austria and its raining -..-

I am currantly working on a Base/Outpost on the "Mun".

The center of the base already on the Mun.

Now have to get the "living rooms" at the Mun.

But iÃ‚Â´m only failing...

Thats the design. You see the Center (that with the 4 rockets) and "living rooms" docked to it and each other. I place them with a Skycrane - works pretty good ;D

-------------------------------------------------------------------

The "living rooms"

My problem is, i dont manage it to get the living room on the mun... How would you design the rocket for it?

I tried many design but without any results.... Please, help me :/

Mfg Regnium
What kind of trouble are you having getting it to Mun? There are different ways to land it, but with a shape like that, it's always going to be hard to steer.
Maybe you can create "engine unit" and dock them radially to you structure to help descent. After you may build rover to get rid of the "engine unit". Just an idea. Not tested

Welcome to the forums!

You might want to clarify on exactly what you mean by "can't get it to the Mun": Do you mean that you can't get it out of the atmosphere? You can get it out of the atmosphere, but not into orbit around Kerbin? You can get it into Kerbin orbit, but not out to an orbit around the Mun? You can get it to the Mun, but can't land it? There might be several possible solutions depending on what exactly is happening.

I'd advise you to also take a look at the Drawing Board (link in my sig), which contains a number of tutorials and other player aids that might prove useful to you in general terms. While some of them discuss basic concepts in fairly abstract terms, it's possible you could apply that knowledge to help yourself out in your current situation. Don't be afraid to ask questions on the How To section of the forums as well, for this design or any others you may come up with in the future.

Happy landings!
Yeah i test some rockets but im not sure how to to atach them... At the bottom or at the docking port, and later i have to land it...

Another Austrian joins the ranks of the Kerbal Space Program. Most excellent my child.

Ich kann auch deutsch sprechen, aber nicht schreiben weil ich in Amerika gelebt habe

Be sure to check out the international forum, I think there's an Austrian thread.

Welcome!
